report.title: HIPAA Compliance Report - Healthcare Module
report.report_description: This report evaluates compliance with HIPAA (Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act) regulations for the protection of Protected Health Information (PHI) in the Healthcare module.
report.ar_description: Augmented Reality authentication provides additional security factors to protect access to Protected Health Information (PHI), in compliance with HIPAA requirements for access control and authentication.

authentication.name: Authentication and Access Control
authentication.description: Verifies requirements related to authentication, identification, and access control for PHI data.

audit.name: Audit Logs
audit.description: Evaluates mechanisms for logging activities and monitoring access to PHI data.

integrity.name: Data Integrity
integrity.description: Checks mechanisms to ensure PHI data is not improperly altered or destroyed.

emergency.name: Emergency Access
emergency.description: Evaluates procedures for accessing PHI data in emergency situations.

transmission.name: Secure Transmission
transmission.description: Verifies encryption and security mechanisms for PHI data transmission.

mfa.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
mfa.description: Enable multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all PHI data access, preferably using the AR authentication factors already available on the platform.

audit_logs.title: Enhance Audit Logs
audit_logs.description: Configure detailed audit logs for all PHI-related activities, including viewing, editing, and exporting.

ar_factors.title: Increase AR Authentication Factors
ar_factors.description: Implement at least two AR authentication factors to enhance security and HIPAA compliance.

encryption.title: Strengthen Data Encryption
encryption.description: Deploy end-to-end encryption for all PHI data at rest and in transit.
